description:
LSEC Bar # 1: Expert contacts over a local beer

You can register HERE – and what's even better: it's all free of charge !


Brewery Tour & Networking

We will kick off this LSEC Bar tradition with a visit to brewery "Het Anker" in Mechelen. We will be able to catch up over a fresh pint afterwards.


Free of charge event

An LSEC Bar is more than just an informal meet-up in a Belgian brewery – it's also a symbol of a low-threshold, unconstrained knowledge exchange. Always free of charge, bringing together 40-50 safety professionals. No excuses, be there!

Program on 18 November 2014

• 16h00 Registration & welcome drink
• 17h00 Opening by Ulrich Seldeslachts, CEO LSEC
• 17h05 Expert speaker 1
• 17h30 Expert speaker 2
• 18h00 Tour of brewery "De Kroon"
• 18h45 LSEC Bar networking

Practical details on the LSEC website : 
http://www.leadersinsecurity.org/events/icalrepeat.detail/2014/11/18/94/-/lsec-bar-2-expert-contacts-over-a-local-beer.html

LSEC BAR # 1 Location: Brewery "Het Anker, Mechelen
Date: Tuesday 18 November, from 4pm till 6.45pm
Registration: Click here

Registration is free of charge upon prior registration

<a href="http://www.brouwerijdekroon.be/"></a>
name: LSEC Bar #1 Mechelen - Het Anker
